ygData.subject: Losing a level
ygData.msgSnippet: Have to say this is one of the best lists that I have ever been on.  Seems to me that most people here are actually adults.  :)  Anyway, enough patting on the
ygData.messageBody:
Have to say this is one of the best lists that I have ever been on. Seems
to me that most people here are actually adults. :) Anyway, enough patting
on the back, I have a quick question. Just made level 16 last night hunting
in Crushbone. I got a few more kills for insurance sake and set off to get
the Ayre. Went to High Keep, got the song, scribed it, memorized it, and
went back to Faydwer. My question is, what if I were to die enough to lose
a level? Would I lose the song completely, just not be able to memorize it,
or what? Haven't seen any discussion on this and was just wondering if
anyone has experienced this yet.

If you are on Veeshan give me a tell and say hi.

Kurik
16th Bard
Veeshan

(No witty description for Kurik yet)
